patch.summary: Update a session request (status or agenda)
patch.description: Updates a session request that belongs to the authenticated mentor. You can update the agenda only while the request is PENDING. Status transitions are restricted: PENDING  ACCEPTED or REJECTED, and ACCEPTED  CANCELLED. When changing to ACCEPTED, a Google Calendar event is created; when changing to CANCELLED, the event is deleted. Cancellation is not allowed if there are less than 6 hours left before the session start.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Service ID (must belong to the authenticated mentor)

status.description: New status for the session request

agenda.description: Short agenda/notes from the mentee; only editable while request is PENDING
agenda.example: Mock interview focusing on system design basics.

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection or cancellation (if applicable)

reject.summary: Reject a pending request with a reason

cancel.summary: Cancel an accepted request (>= 6 hours left)

value.agenda: Please review my latest CV and portfolio.

message.example: Session request has been updated successfully
